subject: Football
Beards and Mustaches
lead_paragraph: Kevin Gilbride, the Giants’ offensive coordinator, inadvertently cut off half his longtime — and legendary — mustache in the days leading up to a preseason game late last month.
snippet: Kevin Gilbride, the Giants’ offensive coordinator, inadvertently cut off half his longtime — and legendary — mustache in the days leading up to a preseason game late last month.
